name: Kasumi
summary: Kasumi is a cheerful girl who, upon moving into a strange new town, received the power of invisibility from a tree god. But she is not alone - there are others like her. With her newfound friends, she'll seek to use her powers for good, without falling into the clutches of those who threaten her!
info:
• 册数: 2
  • 别名: かすみ
  • 出版社: Del Rey Manga
  • 发售日: 2008
